thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 11 of 7322
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text: You've always got what I want, usually at or very close to the best price. Checkout is stone reliable and delivery out here into the hinterlands is quick and often free. It's like having a NYC store way out here. What I pay in mortgage for a farmhouse in a 5 acre wood wouldn't get me a closet in NY. You may not make this the best of all possible worlds, but it's a pretty nice touch just the same.
